title: L1-L2 Integrated Instructional Methodology for Acquiring French Imparfait

context.prior_knowledge: Basic French Grammar and Vocabulary Proficiency (CEFR A1 Level)
context.additional_context: A program to improve accuracy, speed, and stability in the Imparfait tense through L1 (English) and L2 (French) comparison in a mobile learning environment for working professionals. Operated with a focus on formative assessment in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to comprehend sentences using the French Imparfait tense in context with 80% accuracy.
Learners will be able to explain at least three differences in tense expressions between L1 (English) and L2 (French).
Learners will improve their Imparfait processing speed by 20% compared to Week 1 in formative assessments provided on the mobile platform.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
